articles.title: Caf increases Afcon 2021 prize money and will use VAR in all 52 matches - TimesLIVE
articles.description: The Confederation of African Football (Caf) have increased the prize money on the eve of the 2021 Africa Cup of Nations kickoff on Sunday, and said all 52 matches will use Video Assistant Referee (VAR).
